translation.es: Hay cuatro bombas más de aquí a South Temple.

translation.en: It was very disturbing and frightening,
translation.es: Fue muy perturbador y aterrador.

translation.en: and there was all kinds of speculation going on.
translation.es: Hubo toda clase de especulaciones.

translation.en: If there is a reason for today's madness, the answer probably lies
translation.es: Si hay una razón para esto, debe estar en los registros comerciales de Christensen y Sheets.

translation.en: buried in the business records of Christensen and Sheets.
translation.es: debe estar en los registros comerciales de Christensen y Sheets.

translation.en: …theories revolved around high finance and big losses in the CFS company.
translation.es: Las teorías versan sobre altas finanzas y grandes pérdidas de CFS.

translation.en: There was dark talk of disgruntled investors,
translation.es: Se habla de inversionistas disgustados,

translation.en: hired professional killers, and Las Vegas connections.
translation.es: asesinos a sueldo y contactos en Las Vegas.

translation.en: Sheets helped bombing victim Steve Christensen
translation.es: Sheets ayudó a Steve Christensen

translation.en: finance the purchase and study of the so- called Salamander letter
translation.es: a financiar la compra y el análisis de la Carta de la salamandra

translation.en: before it was turned over to the Mormon Church.
translation.es: antes de entregarla a la Iglesia.

translation.en: My feeling is that some disgruntled investor somewhere hired someone to do this.
translation.es: Creo que un inversionista disgustado contrató a alguien para hacer esto.

translation.en: We didn't know who the targets were going to be next,
translation.es: No sabíamos quiénes serían las próximas víctimas

translation.en: if there was anybody that was gonna be next.
translation.es: o siquiera si las habría.

translation.en: Chief Willoughby has been meeting the past hour with other officials,
translation.es: El jefe Willoughby se ha reunido con otros oficiales.

translation.en: and we're going to go to him right now for this briefing.
translation.es: Escuchemos qué nos dice en su informe.

translation.en: At this moment, we have a task force put together
translation.es: A este momento, hemos designado un equipo.

translation.en: because, uh, we definitely feel that there is a direct tie
translation.es: Creemos fervientemente que hay un vínculo directo

translation.en: between both of the bombings here in Salt Lake County and Salt Lake City.
translation.es: entre la explosión de aquí y la de Salt Lake City.

translation.en: There are two areas that we're centering our efforts on,
translation.es: Nos estamos enfocando en dos áreas específicas.

translation.en: and one is the financial dealings,
translation.es: Una son los negocios financieros

translation.en: uh, both Mr. Sheets and Mr. Christensen were involved in.
translation.es: en los que estaban vinculados el Sr. Sheets y el Sr. Christensen.

translation.en: The other motive, uh, we're getting information on has to do with the White Salamander letter, uh,
translation.es: El otro móvil que investigamos se vincula con la Carta de la salamandra,

translation.en: which is now in the possession of the LDS Church.
translation.es: la cual ahora está en posesión de la Iglesia SUD.

translation.en: Hold on. Now, my mind immediately started turning elsewhere.
translation.es: En ese momento, todo cambió por completo.

translation.en: This has something to do with that crazy document deal
translation.es: Esto tenía algo que ver con ese alocado documento

translation.en: that Steve was dealing with.
translation.es: que Steve iba a comprar.

translation.en: Welcome now to Primetime Access. I'm Bruce Lindsay.
translation.es: Bienvenidos a Primetime Access. Soy Bruce Lindsay.

translation.en: On this day of extraordinary news in Salt Lake City,
translation.es: En este inusual día en Salt Lake City,

translation.en: we're going to devote most of the rest of this hour to questions emerging from the murders.
translation.es: dedicaremos el resto de esta hora a hablar sobre las explosiones.

translation.en: The violence began as downtown was opening for business.
translation.es: Todo comenzó por la mañana en el centro de Salt Lake.

translation.en: A morning of fear and death for much of the Wasatch Front.
translation.es: Una mañana de miedo y muertes en Wasatch Front.

translation.en: …an anonymous caller warned there were even more bombs in surrounding buildings.
translation.es: En una llamada anónima se advirtió de más bombas en edificios cercanos.

translation.en: Police say that that call could have been a copycat prank,
translation.es: La policía dice que podría tratarse de una broma,

translation.en: but the department was taking no chances at that point.
translation.es: pero que no se arriesgará a lo contrario.

translation.en: I would, uh, work with Mark, and it was always on Wednesday afternoon.
translation.es: Trabajaba con Mark los miércoles por la tarde.

translation.en: And we would just meet at Walden Book. That was our spot.
translation.es: Siempre nos reuníamos en Walden Book.

translation.en: But on October 16th, I didn't go up that day.
translation.es: Pero no fui el 16 de octubre.

translation.en: Uh, I tried to get ahold of Mark, but I couldn't reach him.
translation.es: Traté de comunicarme con Mark, pero no pude contactarlo.

translation.en: I guess he was running around town that day.
translation.es: Supuse que estaba ocupado.

translation.en: But I did run into Curt Bench, I think, and Curt told me that, uh, he had talked to Mark or something,
translation.es: Pero me encontré con Curt Bench y él me dijo que había hablado con Mark.

translation.en: and he also made it sound like Mark was, uh…
translation.es: Por lo que dijo, me dio a entender que Mark…

translation.en: really nervous. Okay? Really nervous.
translation.es: estaba realmente muy nervioso.

translation.en: An associate of Christensen said, We're filled with absolute terror.
translation.es: Un socio de Christensen dijo: Tenemos muchísimo miedo.

translation.en: The houses were cordoned off, families evacuated, and dogs brought in to sniff for bombs.
translation.es: Perimetraron y evacuaron las casas, y llevaron perros para detectar bombas.

translation.en: None were found.
translation.es: No hallaron nada.

translation.en: I called Mark, and I warned Mark and told him that he ought to get his family out of their house.
translation.es: Llamé a Mark y le advertí que sacara a su familia de la casa.

translation.en: Mark tells me, Christensen has been killed. Kathy Sheets has been killed.
translation.es: Mark me dijo: Asesinaron a Steve Christensen y a Kathy Sheets.

translation.en: I don't know what is happening here.
translation.es: No entiendo qué está pasando.

translation.en: Your life may be in danger. You need to leave the house.
translation.es: Tu vida podría correr peligro. Debes irte de la casa.

translation.en: We don't know if the attacks had something to do with religion or business
translation.es: No sabemos si los ataques fueron por motivos religiosos, comerciales

translation.en: or even possibly both…
translation.es: o quizá ambos.

translation.en: We knew that the people involved in the Mormon document business
translation.es: Sabíamos que los involucrados en la venta de documentos mormones

translation.en: could be potential targets.
translation.es: podían ser blancos potenciales.

translation.en: And Mark did tell me that he had concerns
translation.es: Mark me dijo que estaba preocupado

translation.en: about the McLellin Collection.
translation.es: Mark me dijo que estaba preocupado por la colección McLellin.

translation.en: People had heard things about it, and it was becoming more of a controversial subject.
translation.es: La gente había oído cosas al respecto y se estaba volviendo algo controvertido.

translation.en: Lawmen in Salt Lake City are going all out now to come up with the whys in the tragedy.
translation.es: La policía de Salt Lake City investiga el motivo de esta tragedia.

translation.en: They have come up with some startling information.
translation.es: Han encontrado información sorprendente.

translation.en: It now turns out that there's another collection
translation.es: Parece que hay otra colección de antiguos documentos mormones

translation.en: of early Mormon documents that are reputed to be far more explosive.
translation.es: Parece que hay otra colección de antiguos documentos mormones que sería mucho más explosiva.

translation.en: They're the McLellin Collection.
translation.es: Es la colección McLellin:

translation.en: Books, diaries, and revelations from the era of Joseph Smith.
translation.es: libros, diarios y revelaciones de la época de Joseph Smith.

translation.en: One of the would- be buyers turns out to have been bombing victim Steve Christensen.
translation.es: Uno de los compradores potenciales era Christensen, víctima de la explosión.

translation.en: LDS officials have yet to confirm or deny reports
translation.es: La Iglesia SUD no confirmó ni desmintió

translation.en: that Gordon B. Hinckley had agreed to buy the documents,
translation.es: que Gordon B. Hinckley hubiera aceptado comprar los documentos

translation.en: which are believed to contain controversial information about the founding of the Mormon Church.
translation.es: que tendrían información controvertida sobre los orígenes de la Iglesia.

translation.en: Alvin Rust says the LDS Church had agreed to pay $300,000 for the collection.
translation.es: Alvin Rust dice que la Iglesia SUD había acordado comprarla por $300 000.

translation.en: Who at the Church had agreed to purchase these for $300,000?
translation.es: ¿Quién acordó comprar la colección por 300 000 dólares?

translation.en: It was, uh, Gordon B. Hinckley.
translation.es: Gordon B. Hinckley.

translation.en: I get on the phone to call the prophet of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter- Day Saints.
translation.es: Llamé a la Iglesia SUD para hablar con el profeta.

translation.en: The man that took the call says, What is it about?
translation.es: El hombre que atendió me preguntó por qué motivo llamaba.

translation.en: And I said, It's about the McLellin Collection.
translation.es: Le respondí que era sobre la colección McLellin.

translation.en: He says, Yeah, you and Hofmann were to bring that right now.
translation.es: Y me dijo: Hofmann y tú deben traerla de inmediato.

translation.en: A Church spokesman confirms that Hofmann met with LDS apostles
translation.es: Un vocero de la Iglesia SUD confirmó que Hofmann se reunió con los apóstoles

translation.en: on Tuesday afternoon,
translation.es: el martes por la tarde,

translation.en: just hours after the first bomb killed Steven Christensen.
translation.es: horas antes de que la primera bomba matara a Steven Christensen.

translation.en: He said he wanted to donate the collection to the Church.
translation.es: Dijo que quería donar la colección a la Iglesia.

translation.en: There was no discussion of our purchasing it.
translation.es: Jamás se habló de fuéramos a comprarla.

translation.en: He says, We've got people here right now waiting for the McLellin Collection, to examine it.
translation.es: Dijo: Hay personas que esperan la colección McLellin para examinarla.

translation.en: They want to purchase it for the Church.
translation.es: Quieren comprarla para la Iglesia.

translation.en: Hofmann was to turn over the collection to Christensen the morning Christensen was killed.
translation.es: Hofmann debía darle la colección a Christensen la mañana de la explosión.

translation.en: Hofmann didn't show for the 10:00 a.m. appointment,
translation.es: Hofmann no se presentó a la cita de las 10:00 a. m.

translation.en: but called and asked to meet at 2:00 p.m.
translation.es: Llamó para que se reunieran a las 2:00 p. m.

translation.en: Sources tell Channel 5 Hofmann had at least two meetings set up to peddle the papers.
translation.es: Según fuentes, Hofmann había programado dos reuniones para vender los documentos.

translation.en: …signature and have it witnessed, or something like that.
translation.es: …y que alguien la examine.

translation.en: Yeah, I can tell you also that, uh, the LDS Church is interested in it also.
translation.es: También puedo decirte que la Iglesia SUD está interesada.

translation.en: Yeah, well, that may tend to complicate things.
translation.es: Eso podría llegar a complicar las cosas.

translation.en: They've already acquired, in fact, uh, some other pieces they got from me, - but they don't have this one yet. - Mm- hmm.
translation.es: Ya me han comprado otros artículos, pero aún no tienen esta colección.

translation.en: I don't know what they're interested in it for,
translation.es: No sé por qué les interesa.

translation.en: if they just want to lock it up or…
translation.es: No sé si solo desean ocultarla.

translation.en: I can't imagine them publishing it or anything.
translation.es: No creo que deseen publicarla.

translation.en: Well, be hard to say.
translation.es: ¿Cómo saberlo?

translation.en: - Yeah. - Um…
translation.es: Sí. 16 DE OCTUBRE DE 1985

translation.en: Shannon Flynn is believed to have been working with Hofmann
translation.es: Se cree que Shannon Flynn trabajaba con Hofmann

translation.en: on the sale of those papers.
translation.es: en la venta de los documentos.

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.es: No lo sé.

translation.en: He had an appointment at two o'clock with an attorney
translation.es: Tenía una cita a las 2:00 p. m. con un abogado que representaba a un miembro rico de la Iglesia

translation.en: that represented a well- to- do Church member
translation.es: con un abogado que representaba a un miembro rico de la Iglesia

translation.en: that was going to buy that McLellin Collection,
translation.es: que iba a comprar la colección McLellin.

translation.en: give Mark the money, and kind of keep it for the Church.
translation.es: Iba a darle el dinero a Mark y conservar la colección para la Iglesia.

translation.en: And then the shock came.
translation.es: Y luego ocurrió lo peor.

translation.en: We saw the explosion, and the window in the back flew up in the air.
translation.es: Vimos la explosión. La ventana trasera salió volando.

translation.en: Was it loud? Yeah. It shook this whole building, right here.
translation.es: Fue muy fuerte. Estremeció todo el edificio.

translation.en: I drove out to Mark's house because we had set up a lunch.
translation.es: Fui a la casa de Mark porque íbamos a almorzar juntos.

translation.en: Went and knocked on his door. No one answered.
translation.es: Toqué a la puerta y no obtuve respuesta.

translation.en: No one was home.
translation.es: No había nadie.

translation.en: And, while I was there, there's news of another bombing coming in.
translation.es: Cuando estaba allí, oí las noticias sobre otra explosión.

translation.en: A bomb was placed under the seat of a sports car…
translation.es: Colocaron una bomba bajo el asiento de un auto deportivo…

translation.en: It's a car that's been bombed. It's a Toyota MR2.
translation.es: Habían hecho explotar un auto, un Toyota MR2.

translation.en: All three explosions may be connected to a controversy.
translation.es: Las tres explosiones estarían vinculadas a una controversia.

translation.en: I mean, I immediately said, That's Mark Hofmann's car.
translation.es: Pensé de inmediato: Ese es el auto de Mark Hofmann.

translation.en: …he's pretty banged up. He was missing some fingers that I could see,
translation.es: Está muy herido. Por lo que pude ver, perdió algunos dedos.

translation.en: had a hole kind of on top of his head, had a hole in one of his legs.
translation.es: Tenía un agujero en la cabeza y otro en una pierna.

translation.en: I remember distinctly that I had to pull over my car,
translation.es: Recuerdo claramente que tuve que estacionar el auto,

translation.en: and slamming my hand against the steering wheel and saying aloud,
translation.es: golpeé el volante y grité:

translation.en: Why didn't you listen to me? Why didn't you listen to me?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me escuchaste?.

translation.en: When officers searched Hofmann's car,
translation.es: Al registrar el auto de Mark Hofmann,

translation.en: they found a collection believed to be early Mormon historical documents.
translation.es: se halló lo que serían documentos mormones históricos,

translation.en: They're known as the McLellin Collection.
translation.es: la colección McLellin.

translation.en: I remember running out the door as fast as I could,
translation.es: Recuerdo salir corriendo tan rápido como pude,

translation.en: driving up to the police line, and just…
translation.es: conducir hacia el perímetro policial,

translation.en: jumping out of my car and leaving it in the middle of the street,
translation.es: salir del auto, dejarlo en el medio de la calle

translation.en: and running over to an officer who was standing there,
translation.es: y correr hacia un oficial que estaba ahí.

translation.en: and saying, Excuse me, but I think I know whose car that is.
translation.es: Le dije: Disculpa, pero creo que sé de quién es ese auto.

translation.en: Mark Hofmann was trying to sell historical Mormon documents.
translation.es: Mark Hofmann intentaba vender documentos mormones.

translation.en: The original appointment included Steven Christensen.
translation.es: La reunión original incluía a Steven Christensen.

translation.en: He said, What's your name?
translation.es: Me preguntó cómo me llamaba.

translation.en: And I said, Brent Metcalfe.
translation.es: Le dije: Brent Metcalfe.

translation.en: And he said, I want you to come with me right now.
translation.es: Me dijo que debía acompañarlo de inmediato.

translation.en: And he tells me,
translation.es: Y él me dijo:

translation.en: We have reason to believe that somebody may be trying to kill you.
translation.es: Tenemos razones para creer que alguien intenta matarte.

translation.en: I get a call from a gentleman who said, Randy, you need to take your family and leave.
translation.es: Recibí una llamada de un hombre que dijo: Randy, debes buscar a tu familia y huir.

translation.en: We're gonna have bomb dogs and people come over and actually go through your home.
translation.es: Enviaremos perros y oficiales para buscar bombas en tu casa.

translation.en: I'm now looking underneath my car. I mean…
translation.es: Me puse a buscar debajo del auto.

translation.en: And this is where my mind was. I mean, you didn't dare trust anything.
translation.es: Estaba realmente alterado, todo me generaba desconfianza.

translation.en: Our lives had been totally, uh, torn apart.
translation.es: Nos habían destrozado la vida.

translation.en: They informed me that I was in extreme danger
translation.es: Me informaron que estaba en gran peligro

translation.en: and that my family and I should take every precaution.
translation.es: y que mi familia y yo debíamos tomar precauciones.

translation.en: Please take cover.
translation.es: Busquen refugio.

translation.en: Call your wife immediately, and be very careful right now.
translation.es: Llama a tu esposa de inmediato y tengan mucho cuidado.

translation.en: We don't know what's going on.
translation.es: No sabemos qué pasa.

translation.en: I was at my mother's house, and a phone call came in
translation.es: Estaba en la casa de mi madre y recibimos una llamada.

translation.en: that said Mark had been hurt in a car, with a car bomb.
translation.es: Dijeron que Mark estaba herido, que había explotado una bomba en su auto.

translation.en: And I immediately started shaking.
translation.es: Comencé a temblar de inmediato.

translation.en: My sister drove me down 'cause I couldn't drive. I was too upset.
translation.es: Me llevó mi hermana. No podía conducir, estaba muy alterada.

translation.en: So she drove me down to the hospital.
translation.es: Ella me llevó al hospital.

translation.en: I went into the hospital, told them I was Mark's wife.
translation.es: Entré y les dije que era la esposa de Mark.

translation.en: He was on a table in a gown. He had glass all over his face.
translation.es: Estaba en una mesa con un bata. Tenía vidrio en la cara.

translation.en: None of it made sense to me. Why would these people want to…
translation.es: No entendía nada. ¿Por qué esta gente querría…?

translation.en: Why would they wanna kill Steve or Kathy? Why would anybody wanna kill them?
translation.es: ¿Por qué querrían matar a Steve o Kathy? ¿Quién querría matarlos?

translation.en: It didn't make sense to me. Why would they wanna kill them?
translation.es: No tenía sentido. ¿Por qué querrían matarlos?

translation.en: It just didn't- didn't make sense.
translation.es: No entendía nada.

translation.en: Throughout this day, Salt Lake lawmen rushed to check several bomb threats and suspicious situations.
translation.es: La policía se apresuró a investigar amenazas de bomba y eventos sospechosos.

translation.en: Even tonight, it has extended to the heart of our city.
translation.es: Y ahora se extendió al corazón de nuestra ciudad.

translation.en: Temple Square is at this moment under lockdown.
translation.es: Temple Square está bajo confinamiento.

translation.en: Everyone on the square, including the Mormon Youth Symphony,
translation.es: Todos han debido evacuar, incluido la Mormon Youth Symphony,

translation.en: was evacuated after what was believed to be a bomb threat.
translation.es: Todos han debido evacuar, incluido la Mormon Youth Symphony, tras recibir una amenaza de bomba.

translation.en: Canine units were called in to patrol the grounds.
translation.es: Unidades caninas rastrearon la zona.

translation.en: At the Mormon Church…
translation.es: En la Iglesia mormona…

translation.en: I didn't think the Mormon document world was a dangerous business.
translation.es: No creí que el comercio de documentos mormones era peligroso.

translation.en: I thought it was an exhilarating business,
translation.es: Creí que era emocionante,

translation.en: but there was definitely an underbelly - to Mormon document dealing. -
translation.es: pero era evidente que la comercialización de esos documentos tenía un lado oscuro.

translation.en: - - More than any crimes in memory,
translation.es: Como ningún otro crimen,

translation.en: these bombings have given rise to speculation, theories, and public guessing.
translation.es: estas explosiones han generado teorías, especulaciones y supuestos.

translation.en: Security has been beefed up, and bomb searches carried out.
translation.es: Se intensificó la seguridad y se hicieron rastreos de bombas.

translation.en: The university's archives have…
translation.es: Los archivos universitarios…

translation.en: Some documents vanished or disappeared.
translation.es: Algunos documentos han desaparecido.

translation.en: Uh, we don't really know what might have happened to them.
translation.es: No sabemos realmente qué pasó con ellos.

translation.en: Whoever had committed these murders,
translation.es: Quien haya cometido estos asesinatos

translation.en: they're somehow related to these Mormon documents.
translation.es: estaba relacionado con estos documentos mormones.

translation.en: Police are refusing to comment on reports that Hofmann had other letters
translation.es: La policía se niega a responder si Hofmann tenía otras cartas,

translation.en: believed to be even more damaging to the Church…
translation.es: en teoría, más dañinas para la Iglesia…

translation.en: At this time, I will not comment on that. That's still part of the investigation.
translation.es: No haré comentarios sobre eso ahora. Es parte de la investigación.

translation.en: And a killer is still on the loose.
translation.es: Y el asesino sigue suelto.

translation.en: Most likely, it was somebody who was LDS,
translation.es: Lo más probable era que lo hubiera hecho algún mormón

translation.en: who knew the details of what we were doing.
translation.es: que sabía los detalles de lo que hacíamos.

translation.en: Ties to murder and intrigues have given the Mormon Church the kind of attention it doesn't want.
translation.es: La conexión a los asesinatos trajo atención indeseada a la Iglesia SUD.

translation.en: It could have been someone who had a loved one,
translation.es: Podría haber sido alguien con un ser querido

translation.en: who had a crisis of faith as a result of all of this.
translation.es: que había tenido una crisis de fe como resultado de esto.

translation.en: To have the Church involved in the acquisition
translation.es: Involucrar a la Iglesia en la adquisición de una colección

translation.en: of a collection at this time would simply fuel speculation
translation.es: APÓSTOL DE LA IGLESIA SUD solo alimentaría la especulación

translation.en: that the Church was trying to acquire it in order to suppress it.
translation.es: de que la Iglesia intentaba comprarla para ocultarla.

translation.en: They wanted to inflict damage and harm.
translation.es: Querían causar daño y agravio.

translation.en: A Mormon Church official said there was, quote,
translation.es: Un oficial de la Iglesia SUD dijo:

translation.en: Nothing sinister in the Church's efforts to acquire historical documents
translation.es: No tiene nada de siniestro que la Iglesia quiera comprarle documentos

translation.en: from Mark Hofmann.
translation.es: a Mark Hofmann.

translation.en: Hofmann was hospitalized…
translation.es: Hofmann está internado…

translation.en: It seemed clear to me…
translation.es: Para mí era evidente.

translation.en: this was retaliatory.
translation.es: Esto había sido una venganza.
